To all the people having trouble after downloading and trying get an installation screen.
This are my steps
1) Make sure you have Winrar or other type that can use rar.
2) Open your winrar program, locate the file name Zoo_Tycoon_2 
It should be there

End of part 1

3) Now press Extract to.. button in your winrar program 
4) You should see a list of location. To make it easier to locate, create a new folder on the desktop and name it anything, i named mine "Zoo Tycoon 2 Installation"

End of part 2

5) Select that folder, and press ok
6) It should run now
7) A small window opens and ask for "You need to find following volume to continue extraction:" 8) Select Browse and click ztcoon2.002 and press ok, do the same thing again for ztycoon3.003

End of part 3

9) Now it should run to the end and produce two files .bin and .cue files
10) Now go find daemon tools and download version 4 from the website
http://www.daemon-tools.cc/dtcc/announcements.php
If you have this program you can skip step 10.

End of part 4

11) Install the program, Just follow the instruction process.
12) Once installed open Daemon Icon on your desktop and go to where your clock is and locate the damon icon, right click, go to Vitual cd/Dvd and go to Device (your drive letter) and find the word Mount Images and left click it

End of part 5

13) Now locate your file on your desktop, go to step 4 to see installation file name. select the .cue file and press Open and your done. 
14) To check go to my computer and 'zoo tycoon 2' image icon should appear. All you have to do double click the icon and the installation should appear on your screen

What an explanation!! This seriously should help for novice like me on this rar files 

Final 
End of Part 6

I followed Barthowdy's instructions, but the small window described in step 7 never showed up.

Ok here's how I did it and it works 100%

1) Do NOT rename anything, if you did then it might still work, not sure.

2) Go to the "Zoo_Tycoon_2" Folder and locate the file named "ztycoon2.001".

3) Right click the file and select open, then select "select the program from a list".

4)  Scroll down till you find winrar on the list, then select it, make sure that the "Always use this program for this type of file" option box is not checked, then hit open.

5) There's the .bin and .cue files, most of you about now know what to do and can probably wing it, but.

6) Well, extract the two files someplace easy to find, I just extracted them into the "Zoo_Tycoon_2" folder.

7) Go download Daemon tools (google it, it'll be easy to find).

8) Install and run Daemon tools, you should now see the icon in the system tray (bottom right hand of your screen where the time is).

9) Right click the icon in your system tray, and go to Virtual CD/DVD ROM, then Device 0: [F:] No Media (or whatever yours is named), and click Mount Image.

10) Now an exploration window will pop up, find the folder where you extracted the .bin and .cue files to, then select the file ztycoon.cue and click open.

11) Now just install the game and play. o.o

This worked for me curious to see if it did for anyone else too.

Noobs. After downloading, you NEED to seed, it's only a way of helping downloads to continue. 

Here's how you seed:

After downloading your .torrent, keep uTorrent, LimeWire, FrostWire, BitComet or whatever you use to download .torrent files, running in your system tray down the bottom left-hand corner of the screen. All you need to do is keepit running! 

That is how you seed; please seed!

P.S I suggest to use uTorrent to download .torrent files, as it uses less than 5k memory when left sitting in the system tray.
